title: Autodesk | Software Engineer 1 | Accepted | Bengaluru
content:
**College:** Tier 2 Private University
**Education:** B.Tech in CSE
**Mode:** Poolcampus
**Years of Experience:** 0 (2024 batch)
**Date of the Offer:** 2nd Week of June, 2024
**Company:** Autodesk
**Title/Level:** SDE 1
**Location:** Bengaluru, India
**Base Salary:** 14,00,000
**Signing Bonus:** 5% of base pay
**Stock bonus:** 23000 USD (equally vested over 3 years)
**Yearend Bonus:** 8% of base pay
**Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock):** ~ 40Lacs
**First Year Comp**: 23.5Lacs

Posting a bit late. Started working as FTE from July 2024 Itself.

title: Google | L5 | Hyderabad | Offer
content:
Hello,

Being a long time lurker on this section, so helping back the community.

Education: Bachelors from NIT
Years of Experience: 7 years
Prior Experience: Product Based Startup
Previous CTC: 52L


Company: Google
Title/Level: L5
Date of the Offer: May 2024
Location: Hyderabad


Base Salary: 60.5L
Bonus Yearly: 15% ~ 9L
Relocation: ~ 3.3L
Joining Bonus: 15L
RSU: $225K for 4 years (1st year 70L vesting)
Benefits: Standard Google benefits


CTC: ~1.57 Cr (1st year)
